Text: Yea, its better in the sens that it works with no crashes but this is just identical to the one Darkcoder released, i.e. not a real crack just a loader with securom registry entries. The FLT one may crash when you pick up money but at least it completely removes securom from the exe.
Right, but its an 3 months old crack ((BioShock.CRACKFIX-iND)) , and made the game not unplayable for me atleast , very very slow. And id dint had the chance to try out the kicking out.
